WorkItem.ClosedComment: This issues is addressed with Prism 5.0
WorkItem.Description: The current NuGet package uses the standard CommonServiceLocator, but now that there's a CSL that uses PortableClassLibrary (PCL) it would be helpful to have a Prism package that takes a dependency on Portable.CommonServiceLocator
WorkItem.Summary: NuGet Package Using Portable Class Library Version of CommonServiceLocator
